about_the_game:
• To run this game, a webcam is needed.
  • As a young man borned in a small town, you've been dreaming about flying in the sky. One day you enter a world of wingsuit hero, and hero you can show your incredible talent of flying.
  • In this game players can fly through mountains, lakes, trees, cliffs, rivers, sea, islands, canyon, tunnels, clounds, conquer harsh terrain, and become more and more famous in the world.
  • Because there is an AI system embeded to control the character, players need a webcam to run this game. In this game players are a hero with wingsuit, fly freely in the sky, get realistic flying experience.
  • There are three basic levels in this game, and players can also design their own air lines to fly.
  • The wingsuit in this game is motivative, so players can fly at any direction freely.
detailed_description:
• To run this game, a webcam is needed.
  • As a young man borned in a small town, you've been dreaming about flying in the sky. One day you enter a world of wingsuit hero, and hero you can show your incredible talent of flying.
  • In this game players can fly through mountains, lakes, trees, cliffs, rivers, sea, islands, canyon, tunnels, clounds, conquer harsh terrain, and become more and more famous in the world.
  • Because there is an AI system embeded to control the character, players need a webcam to run this game. In this game players are a hero with wingsuit, fly freely in the sky, get realistic flying experience.
  • There are three basic levels in this game, and players can also design their own air lines to fly.
  • The wingsuit in this game is motivative, so players can fly at any direction freely.
name: Wingsuit Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 OR RX580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • VR Support: Web Camera
  • Additional Notes: A web camera is necessary.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060 OR RX5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • VR Support: Web Camera
  • Additional Notes: A web camera is necessary.

short_description: A pose control game by using a camera in which players are incarnated as a wingsuit hero, fly through mountains, lakes, trees, cliffs, rivers, sea,islands,canyon, tunnels, clounds etc. With an AI system embeded, players can experence seemingly realistic flying, and design an air line oneself.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
